English: ...So we just decided to go and take down Hosaka.
Chinese: ……所以，你就瞞著我們，自己跑去打倒保坂了啊。
Korean: ……그래서 우리들에겐 말도 없이 호사카를 쓰러뜨리러 간 거구나
German:
... Also haben wir uns entschieden,
Hosaka auszuschalten.

English: ...Hmph.
Korean: ……흐응
German: ... Hmpf.

English:
Erika, you were investigating Hosaka this whole
time. So are you sad because they got there
before you?
Chinese:
艾莉卡也一直在調查保坂喔。
所以你這樣拋下她一個人跑去，她很寂寞喔。
Korean:
에리카는 계속 호사카에 대해 조사하고 있었어.
그래서 따돌린 것 같아 섭섭해하고 있는 거잖아?
German:
Erika, du hast die ganze Zeit gegen Hosaka
ermittelt. Bist du also traurig, weil sie dir
zuvorgekommen sind?

English:
You didn't have to say that!
Besides, I'm not sad!
Chinese:
不、不用說出來啦……！
還有，我才沒有寂寞！
Korean:
마, 말하지 않아도 돼……!
그리고 별로 섭섭하지도 않아!
German:
Das war ein unnötiger Kommentar!
Außerdem bin ich nicht traurig!

English:
Huh? But three days ago you were thinking you
wanted payback for getting beat in
Shinjuku, right?
Chinese:
咦？　但是妳三天前不是想要還
在新宿倒下時欠的人情嗎？
Korean:
응? 그치만 신주쿠에서 쓰러져버린 빚을 갚고 싶다고
3일 전에 생각했잖아?
German:
Hm? Aber vor drei Tagen dachtest du noch,
dass du Rache für deine Niederlage in Shinjuku
nehmen wolltest, oder?

English:
Four days ago you were mad about getting hit with
Memetan, and five days ago, you--
Chinese:
四天前還很在意用小梅梅打了他，
五天前是──
Korean:
4일 전엔 메메땅으로 때린 것을 또 신경쓰고 있었고
5일 전에는――
German:
Vor vier Tagen warst du wütend, weil du
mit Memetan geschlagen wurdest und vor
fünf Tagen ...

English: Stop talking, I said!
Chinese: 我說了不用說出來啦！
Korean: 말하지 말라니까!
German: Luke dicht, hab ich gesagt!

English: Oh, sorry... That was meant for Wormmon.
Chinese:
啊，對不起……
一順手就拿你代替了蟲蟲獸。
Korean:
아, 미안……
추추몬 대신에 그만
German: Oh, sorry ... Der war eigentlich für Wormmon.

English:
Huh?! So if I'd been there, you'd have hit me!?
Dang...
Chinese:
咦！？　那要是我在那邊就會被打囉……！？
好險……
Korean:
엑!? 그럼 거기에 있던 게 나였으면 내가 맞았단 거…!?
히에에……
German:
Hä?! Wär ich also dort gewesen, hättest du mich
gehauen? Mensch ...

English:
I don't think that you owe me or anything.
I was just mad you were so reckless.
Chinese:
……我才沒有覺得欠你人情，
我只是受不了你怎麼這麼莽撞。
Korean:
……빚을 졌다고는 딱히 생각하지 않으니까.
네가 너무 무모하니까 질렸을 뿐이야
German:
Ich glaube nicht, dass du in meiner Schuld stehst
oder so was. Ich war nur wütend, weil du so
verantwortungslos warst.

English: Right, Ryuji?
Chinese: 對吧，哥哥。
Korean: 그렇지? 오빠
German: Richtig, Ryuji?

English:
...It's their problem.
We should mind our own business.
Chinese:
…………那是他的問題，
不是我們該插手的事。
Korean:
…………그 녀석의 문제야.
우리들이 이러쿵저러쿵 할 일은 아니지
German:
... Nicht unser Problem. Wir sollten uns um unsere
eigenen Angelegenheiten kümmern.

English:
What about your account?
You gonna keep searching for it?
Chinese:
帳號問題，你接下來想怎麼做？
還要繼續找嗎？
Korean:
계정은 어떻게 할 거냐?
계속 찾을 건가?
German:
Was ist mit deinem Konto?
Wirst du weiter danach suchen?

English:
But with Hosaka's account gone, it'll be tough to
track it down.
Chinese: 現在保坂的帳號消失了，要追蹤會很困難喔。
Korean: 호사카의 계정이 지워진 이상 추적은 어렵겠지
German:
Aber jetzt, da Hosakas Account weg ist,
wird es schwer aufzufinden sein.

English:
Maybe you should go to Under Zero?
Everyone from Zaxon is going, right?
Chinese:
去Under Zero不就好了嗎？
Zaxon不是所有人都以那邊為目標嗎？
Korean:
언더 제로로 가면 되지 않을까?
잭슨 모두가 향하고 있잖아?
German:
Vielleicht solltest du zu Unter Null?
Alle von Zaxon gehen hin, oder?

English:
They keep records of all the logs in EDEN.
You should find it--
Chinese:
EDEN的所有紀錄都在那邊，
那一定──
Korean:
EDEN의 모든 로그가 남아있다고 하니까
거기라면――
German:
Sie bewahren Aufzeichnungen aller Protokolle
in EDEN auf. Du solltest sie finden–

English: No!!!
Chinese: 不行！
Korean: 소용없어!
German: Nein!!!

English: Yikes...
Korean: 히에……
German: Auweia ...

English: Stay the hell away from Under Zero.
Chinese: 那邊……不准接近Under Zero。
Korean: 거기에는……언더 제로에는 접근하지 마라
German: Halt dich verflucht noch mal von Unter Null fern!

English: Ryuji...?
Chinese: 哥哥……？
Korean: 오빠……?
German: Ryuji ...?

English: ...Find your account some other way. Get me?
Chinese: ……用別的方法找你的帳號，知道了吧。
Korean: ……계정은 뭔가 다른 수를 써서 찾아. 알겠지
German: ... Such deinen Account woanders, hast du kapiert?

English: Jeez... He was really mad...
Chinese: 嗚嗚……惹他生氣了……
Korean: 우우……혼나버렸어……
German: Meine Güte ... Der war ja stinksauer ...

English:
What's up with him?
Even Chitose has been acting weird...
Chinese:
龍司怎麼了啊？
千歲也在之前就找不到人了……
Korean:
류지, 무슨 일 있었어?
치토세도 얼마 전부터 보이지 않고……
German:
Was ist mit ihm los?
Sogar Chitose verhält sich merkwürdig ...

English: ...Did something happen?
Chinese: ……發生什麼了嗎？
Korean: ……무슨 일이 있었어?
German: ... Ist etwas passiert?
